alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Golden Valley; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Northern Carbon; Northern Rosebud; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass; Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Red Lodge Foothills; Southern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone; Treasure (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 11 at 3:57AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A line of showers with strong winds will impact portions of Stillwater, northwestern Big Horn, northwestern Carbon, southeastern Musselshell, Yellowstone, southern Golden Valley, northeastern Sweet Grass, northern Rosebud and Treasure Counties through 500 AM MDT... At 355 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers along a cold front extending from 7 miles northeast of Melstone to 16 miles north of Shepherd to 21 miles south of Deadmans Basin Reservoir. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Billings, Hardin, Columbus, Hysham, Custer, Laurel, Joliet, Fromberg, Melstone, Lockwood, Worden, Huntley, Pryor, Shepherd, Billings Heights, Billings West End, Absarokee, Ballantine, Broadview and Reed Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
